# CAM::SET_CAM_USE_SHALLOW_DOF_MODE

## Summary
Set whether the camera should use the shallow DOF mode of the high-quality depth of field effect (when enabled using SET_USE_HI_DOF.)

## Parameters
* **CAMERA_INDEX** camera
* **BOOL** state
